knimeNode.name: Database GroupBy
knimeNode.shortDescription: The Database GroupBy allows to group by the selected columns and output aggregated data to the generated groups.

fullDescription.intro: This node allows rows to be grouped by the selected columns from the input database table. Within the dialog, an SQL GROUP BY clause is interactively created by selecting the columns to group by and the columns to aggregate.
fullDescription.option: Select one or more column(s) according to which the group(s) is/are created.
Select one or more column(s) for aggregation from the available columns list. Change the aggregation method in the Aggregation column of the table. You can add the same column multiple times.

The name of the resulting aggregation column(s) depends on the selected naming schema.
Keep original name(s): Keeps the original column names.
Aggregation method (column name): Uses the aggregation method first and appends the column name in brackets
Column name (aggregation method): Uses the column name first and appends the aggregation method in brackets

ports.inPort: Table in database to apply group by
ports.outPort: Table in the database with grouped rows
